description.en:
1. Junjou Erotica (Pure Erotica)
Heartbroken by her first love, senior high year 2 student Rika develops a fear of romance. One day, she finds out her first love's weak point! From then on, she starts her revenge...

1.5. Passionate Erotica (not scanlated)

2. Renai Teppen Shugi (Romance Summit Principle)
The two most popular people in school, Rinko and Shirou, are pretending to be a couple to keep people from confessing to them. Rinko is slowly falling in love with Shirou, so what happens when someone finds out about their fake relationship?

3. Romeo na Kanojo (My Girlfriend Is Romeo)
Seiya was the prince of his school until a new girl, Ryou, transferred in. "If I can't win against her, my only other option is to make her fall for me!"

4. Ouji to Kiss to Nemurihime (Prince & Kiss & Sleeping Beauty)
Shiya has a phobia with boys. What can she do, but ask the almighty ?prince? of the school for help? The prince is shocked that this girl doesn?t like him, and decides to make her fall in love with him! But Shiya has a weird curse: every time a boy touches her, she faints!
